title: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834 - Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row is deleted. Additionally, the Launch item is moved to the first row after the delete occurs.
EB: When the Delete button is pressed, the first item on the second row should be deleted. However, the second row should remain intact. The Launch item should stay on the second row.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Press the Delete button. 
2. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the Launch item is moved to the first row.
